landing.title: The bull free Twitter experience you always wanted
landing.description: Get daily reports compiled for the Twitter accounts you care about. All the tweets you want, none of the clutter. Customize reports to show chronological tweets, only the most popular tweets, and more. All of this in a fast and easy format to digest, right in your email inbox.

authentication.signUp: Sign up for No Bull Twitter
authentication.signUpDescription: Sign up using your Google account
authentication.earlyAccess: Sign up to get early access to the No Bull Twitter beta
authentication.earlyAccessThankYou: Thank you for signing up! We'll email you when it's open!
authentication.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Login here.
authentication.doNotHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up here.

profile.title: Your Profile
